306,104|254,128|209,156|203,191|201,205|220,205|240,206|280,206|300,207|360,207|380,208|420,208|440,218|460,212|480,216|500,209|520,210|580,210|600,211|640,211|660,212|720,212|740,213|780,213|800,214|860,214|880,215|920,215|940,216|1000,216|1020,217|1080,217|1100,218|1140,218|1160,219|1220,219|1240,220|1280,220|1300,221|1360,221|1380,222|1420,222|1440,223|1500,223|1520,224|1580,224|1600,225|1640,225|1660,226|1720,226|1740,227|1780,227|1800,228|1860,228|1880,229|1920,229|1940,230|1954,230|1959,215|1957,185|1724,146|1535,144|1303,136|1161,129|1160,129|1140,128|1080,128|1060,127|1057,124|1025,122|1020,127|1000,127|980,126|937,126|611,142|434,120|420,120|400,119|340,119|323,106|306,104 279-01|Letters,|Orders|and|Instructions.|November|1755.|279.

1926,1631|1920,1631|1880,1631|1860,1632|1800,1632|1780,1633|1720,1633|1700,1634|1660,1634|1640,1635|1580,1635|1560,1636|1520,1636|1500,1637|1440,1637|1420,1638|1400,1638|1380,1658|1360,1659|1340,1639|1320,1659|1300,1639|1280,1640|1260,1646|1240,1666|1220,1684|1200,1688|1180,1688|1160,1641|1140,1642|1080,1642|1060,1643|1020,1643|1000,1644|940,1644|920,1645|880,1645|860,1646|800,1646|780,1647|760,1647|740,1674|720,1674|700,1690|680,1712|660,1724|640,1726|629,1685|384,1666|228,1710|216,1724|234,1748|240,1748|260,1747|300,1747|320,1746|360,1746|380,1788|400,1788|420,1774|440,1762|460,1744|480,1744|500,1743|540,1743|560,1742|600,1742|620,1741|640,1741|660,1740|700,1740|720,1739|740,1739|760,1759|780,1778|800,1758|820,1738|840,1737|880,1737|900,1756|920,1756|940,1736|960,1735|1000,1735|1020,1734|1060,1734|1080,1733|1100,1773|1120,1773|1140,1752|1160,1732|1180,1731|1220,1731|1240,1730|1280,1730|1300,1729|1340,1729|1360,1728|1400,1728|1420,1747|1440,1747|1460,1767|1480,1726|1520,1726|1540,1725|1560,1745|1580,1745|1600,1724|1640,1724|1660,1723|1680,1723|1700,1722|1740,1722|1760,1721|1800,1721|1820,1720|1860,1720|1880,1719|1900,1759|1920,1739|1940,1718|1942,1718|1946,1686|1926,1631 279-17|to|Sergeant|Wilper|(|taking|his|receipt|for|the|same|)
1940,1718|1920,1739|1900,1759|1880,1719|1860,1720|1820,1720|1800,1721|1760,1721|1740,1722|1700,1722|1680,1723|1660,1723|1640,1724|1600,1724|1580,1745|1560,1745|1540,1725|1520,1726|1480,1726|1460,1767|1440,1747|1420,1747|1400,1728|1360,1728|1340,1729|1300,1729|1280,1730|1240,1730|1220,1731|1180,1731|1160,1732|1140,1752|1120,1773|1100,1773|1080,1733|1060,1734|1020,1734|1000,1735|960,1735|940,1736|920,1756|900,1756|880,1737|840,1737|820,1738|800,1758|780,1778|760,1759|740,1739|720,1739|700,1740|660,1740|640,1741|620,1741|600,1742|560,1742|540,1743|500,1743|480,1744|460,1744|440,1762|420,1774|400,1788|380,1788|360,1746|320,1746|300,1747|260,1747|240,1748|234,1748|235,1749|227,1817|213,1833|206,1860|207,1861|229,1865|240,1854|260,1833|300,1833|320,1832|360,1832|380,1831|420,1831|440,1830|480,1830|500,1829|520,1829|540,1828|580,1828|600,1827|640,1827|660,1846|700,1846|720,1825|760,1825|780,1824|800,1824|820,1844|840,1863|860,1843|880,1823|900,1822|920,1822|940,1821|980,1821|1000,1820|1040,1820|1060,1819|1100,1819|1120,1818|1160,1818|1180,1857|1220,1857|1240,1836|1260,1856|1280,1836|1300,1815|1340,1815|1360,1814|1380,1814|1400,1813|1440,1813|1460,1812|1500,1812|1520,1831|1540,1831|1560,1811|1580,1810|1620,1810|1640,1829|1660,1849|1680,1829|1700,1828|1720,1828|1740,1808|1760,1847|1780,1847|1800,1826|1820,1806|1840,1806|1860,1805|1900,1805|1920,1804|1925,1804|1934,1784|1942,1718 279-18|for|the|use|of|Captain|Hoggs|Company,|eight
